panels.description: P95 captures typical worst-case performance, letting us spot creeping latency before the SLA is violated

targets.rawSql:
SELECT
  percentile_cont(0.95)
    WITHIN GROUP (
      ORDER BY extract(epoch FROM (inserted_at - received_at)) * 1000
    ) AS p95_latency_ms
FROM ingestion_metrics
WHERE $__timeFilter(inserted_at);

panels.title: P95 Write Latency (SLA)

panels.description: Ingestion Rate (Throughput) for CSV/MQTT loads. Instant “ops per minute” at a glance, with the sparkline revealing past bursts

targets.rawSql:
SELECT
  time_bucket('1 minute', inserted_at) AS time,
  COUNT(*) AS rate_per_min
FROM ingestion_metrics
WHERE $__timeFilter(inserted_at)
GROUP BY 1
ORDER BY 1;

panels.title: Ingestion Rate (Throughput) (CSV/MQTT loads)

panels.description: Hourly bars give immediate insight into when and how often errors spike

targets.rawSql:
SELECT
  time_bucket('1 hour', time) AS "time",
  count(*) AS "errors_per_hr"
FROM sensor_errors
WHERE $__timeFilter(time)
GROUP BY 1
ORDER BY 1;

panels.title: Error rate (malformed/hr)

panels.description: Highlight any hours with zero ingestions so can immediately see when the pipeline went silent

targets.rawSql:
WITH all_hours AS (
  SELECT generate_series(
    date_trunc('hour',   to_timestamp($__from/1000)),
    date_trunc('hour',   to_timestamp($__to  /1000)),
    '1 hour'::interval
  ) AS bucket
),
seen AS (
  SELECT time_bucket('1 hour', inserted_at) AS bucket
  FROM ingestion_metrics
  WHERE $__timeFilter(inserted_at)
  GROUP BY 1
)
SELECT
  a.bucket   AS "time",
  1          AS gap_flag
FROM all_hours a
LEFT JOIN seen s
  ON a.bucket = s.bucket
WHERE s.bucket IS NULL
ORDER BY a.bucket;

panels.title: Missing-Data Gaps (> 2h zero ingest)

panels.description: See how the model’s scores are distributed, are pushing too many low-confidence calls

targets.rawSql:
SELECT
  ((width_bucket(confidence, 0, 1, 20) - 1)::float / 20) AS bucket_start,
  count(*) AS cnt
FROM sensor_data
WHERE $__timeFilter(time)
  AND common_name    IN ($specie)
  AND common_name NOT IN (${exclude:sqlstring})
  AND confidence    >= $confidence
GROUP BY bucket_start
ORDER BY bucket_start;

panels.title: Confidence Score Distribution (0 – 1)

panels.description: Hourly count of detections below confidence threshold (0.6), highlighting potential noise or mis-classification events

targets.rawSql:
SELECT
  time_bucket('1 hour', time) AS "time",
  count(*) FILTER (WHERE confidence < 0.6) AS "low_conf_per_hr"
FROM sensor_data
WHERE $__timeFilter(time)
  AND common_name IN ($specie)
  AND common_name NOT IN (${exclude:sqlstring})
GROUP BY 1
ORDER BY 1;

panels.title: Low-Confidence Detections (/hr)

panels.description: Percentage of hourly intervals in the last 24 hours with at least one detection, verifies end to end pipeline completeness

targets.rawSql:
WITH hours AS (
  SELECT generate_series(
    date_trunc('hour', now() - '24 hours'::interval),
    date_trunc('hour', now()),
    '1 hour'::interval
  ) AS hr
),
ingested AS (
  SELECT
    time_bucket('1 hour', time) AS hr
  FROM sensor_data
  WHERE
    time >= now() - '24 hours'::interval
    AND common_name    IN ($specie)
    AND common_name NOT IN (${exclude:sqlstring})
    AND confidence    >= $confidence
  GROUP BY 1
)
SELECT
  100.0 * COUNT(ing.hr) / COUNT(hours.hr) AS completeness_pct
FROM hours
LEFT JOIN ingested ing USING (hr);

panels.title: Data Completeness (last 24 h)

panels.description: Total number of detection events in the selected time window (filtered by species & confidence)

targets.rawSql:
SELECT
  count(*) AS total_observations
FROM sensor_data
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(time)
  AND common_name IN ($specie)
  AND common_name NOT IN (${exclude:sqlstring})
  AND confidence >= $confidence;

panels.title: Total Observations

panels.description: Mean model confidence score for all detections in the time window (higher = more certain)

targets.rawSql:
SELECT
  round(avg(confidence)::numeric, 3) AS avg_confidence
FROM sensor_data
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(time)
  AND common_name IN ($specie)
  AND common_name NOT IN (${exclude:sqlstring})
  AND confidence >= $confidence;

panels.title: Avg Confidence

panels.description: Count of distinct species detected in the time window

targets.rawSql:
SELECT
  count(DISTINCT common_name) AS unique_species
FROM sensor_data
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(time)
  AND common_name IN ($specie)
  AND common_name NOT IN (${exclude:sqlstring})
  AND confidence >= $confidence;

panels.title: Unique Species

panels.description: Average duration of each audio clip per detection in seconds

targets.rawSql:
SELECT
  round(avg(end_seconds - start_seconds)::numeric, 1) AS avg_audio_length_sec
FROM sensor_data
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(time)
  AND common_name IN ($specie)
  AND common_name NOT IN (${exclude:sqlstring})
  AND confidence >= $confidence;

panels.title: Avg Audio Length

panels.description: Duration of the selected time window in hours (used for rate calculations)

targets.rawSql:
SELECT
  extract(
    epoch
    FROM $__timeTo()::timestamp
      - $__timeFrom()::timestamp
  ) 
  / 3600.0
  AS window_hours;

panels.title: Window Length

panels.description: Total detections divided by window length (hrs), giving the average hourly detection rate

targets.rawSql:
SELECT
  ROUND(
    count(*) * 3600.0
    / EXTRACT(
        EPOCH
        FROM $__timeTo()::timestamp
          - $__timeFrom()::timestamp
      )
  , 2) AS avg_detections_per_hour
FROM sensor_data
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(time)
  AND common_name    IN ($specie)
  AND common_name NOT IN (${exclude:sqlstring})
  AND confidence    >= $confidence;

panels.title: Avg Detections

panels.description: Dual axes to compare volume vs diversity. Bar = total number of detections per day. Line = count of unique species detected each day

targets.rawSql:
WITH daily AS (
  SELECT
    time_bucket('1 day', time) AS day,
    count(*)                   AS total_obs,
    count(DISTINCT common_name) AS species_count
  FROM sensor_data
  WHERE
    $__timeFilter(time)
    AND common_name IN ($specie)
    AND common_name NOT IN (${exclude:sqlstring})
    AND confidence >= $confidence
  GROUP BY 1
)
SELECT
  day AS "time",
  total_obs AS "Total Observations",
  species_count AS "Species Count"
FROM daily
ORDER BY day;

panels.title: Daily Volume  and Species Count

panels.description: Stacked bar chart showing per day breakdown of detection counts by species, revealing the relative contribution of each species to daily volume

targets.rawSql:
SELECT
  time_bucket('1 day', time) AS "time",
  common_name AS "metric",
  count(*) AS "value"
FROM sensor_data
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(time)
  AND common_name IN ($specie)
  AND common_name NOT IN (${exclude:sqlstring})
  AND confidence >= $confidence
GROUP BY 1, common_name
ORDER BY 1;

panels.title: Daily Composition by Species

panels.description: Time-series lines of hourly detection counts for each species. Highlights fine grained and intraday activity patterns

targets.rawSql:
SELECT
  time_bucket('1 hour', time) AS "time",
  common_name AS "metric",
  count(*) AS "value"
FROM sensor_data
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(time)
  AND common_name IN ($specie)
  AND common_name NOT IN (${exclude:sqlstring})
  AND confidence >= $confidence
GROUP BY 1, common_name
ORDER BY 1;

panels.title: Hourly Trend by Species

panels.description: Stacked bar chart of 7 day buckets, shows how each species contributes to weekly detection volumes over time

targets.rawSql:
SELECT
  time_bucket('7 days', time) AS "time",
  common_name AS "metric",
  count(*) AS "value"
FROM sensor_data
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(time)
  AND common_name IN ($specie)
  AND common_name NOT IN (${exclude:sqlstring})
  AND confidence >= $confidence
GROUP BY 1, common_name
ORDER BY 1;

panels.title: Weekly Composition by Species

panels.description: Smoothed trend line showing the 7 day moving average of daily detection counts, filters out day to day noise to highlight underlying volume trends

targets.rawSql:
WITH daily AS (
  SELECT
    time_bucket('1 day', time) AS day,
    count(*) AS total_obs
  FROM sensor_data
  WHERE
    $__timeFilter(time)
    AND common_name IN ($specie)
    AND common_name NOT IN (${exclude:sqlstring})
    AND confidence >= $confidence
  GROUP BY 1
)
SELECT
  day AS "time",
  round(
    avg(total_obs) OVER (
      ORDER BY day
      ROWS BETWEEN 6 PRECEDING AND CURRENT ROW
    )::numeric
  , 2) AS "7-Day Rolling Avg"
FROM daily
ORDER BY day;

panels.title: 7-Day Rolling Avg of Daily Totals

panels.description: Pie chart of the five most frequent species by count, with a combined “Other” slice representing the rest

targets.rawSql:
WITH counts AS (
  SELECT
    common_name,
    count(*) AS cnt
  FROM sensor_data
  WHERE
    $__timeFilter(time)
    AND common_name IN ($specie)
    AND common_name NOT IN (${exclude:sqlstring})
    AND confidence >= $confidence
  GROUP BY common_name
),
top5 AS (
  SELECT common_name, cnt
  FROM counts
  ORDER BY cnt DESC
  LIMIT 5
),
others AS (
  SELECT
    'Other' AS common_name,
    COALESCE(SUM(cnt),0) AS cnt
  FROM counts
  WHERE common_name NOT IN (SELECT common_name FROM top5)
)
SELECT metric, value
FROM (
  SELECT common_name AS metric, cnt AS value FROM top5
  UNION ALL
  SELECT common_name AS metric, cnt AS value FROM others
) AS unioned
ORDER BY
  CASE WHEN metric = 'Other' THEN 2 ELSE 1 END,
  value DESC;

panels.title: Top 5 Species Pie

panels.description: Horizontal bar gauge ranking species by total detection count and colour thresholds to quickly identify the most and least common species

targets.rawSql:
SELECT
  common_name AS "metric",
  count(*) AS "value"
FROM sensor_data
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(time)
  AND common_name IN ($specie)
  AND common_name NOT IN (${exclude:sqlstring})
  AND confidence >= $confidence
GROUP BY common_name
ORDER BY value DESC;

panels.title: Species Distribution

panels.description: Heatmap showing daily detection counts for each species, where brighter cells indicate higher daily activity per species

targets.rawSql:
SELECT
  time_bucket('1 day', time) AS "time",
  common_name AS "metric",
  count(*) AS "value"
FROM sensor_data
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(time)
  AND common_name IN ($specie)
  AND common_name NOT IN (${exclude:sqlstring})
  AND confidence >= $confidence
GROUP BY 1,2
ORDER BY 1,2;

panels.title: Daily Species Pattern Detection

panels.description: Stacked-bar chart showing per-hour detection counts, with each colour segment representing a species’s share of the total

targets.rawSql:
WITH by_hour AS (
  SELECT
    extract(hour FROM time)::int AS h,
    common_name AS species,
    count(*) AS cnt
  FROM sensor_data
  WHERE
    $__timeFilter(time)
    AND common_name IN ($specie)
    AND common_name NOT IN (${exclude:sqlstring})
    AND confidence >= $confidence
  GROUP BY 1,2
)
SELECT
  date_trunc('day', now())
    + (h || ' hours')::interval AS "time",
  species AS "metric",
  cnt AS "value"
FROM by_hour
ORDER BY h, species;

panels.title: Hourly Detections by Species

panels.description: Bubble chart plotting each species’ ordinal rank by detection count (x-axis) against its total detections (y-axis), with bubble size proportional to count, visualising dominance and the long-tail drop-off in relative abundance

targets.rawSql:
WITH counts AS (
  SELECT
    common_name,
    count(*) AS cnt
  FROM sensor_data
  WHERE
    $__timeFilter(time)
    AND common_name IN ($specie)
    AND common_name NOT IN (${exclude:sqlstring})
    AND confidence >= $confidence
  GROUP BY common_name
),
ranked AS (
  SELECT
    common_name,
    cnt,
    row_number() OVER (ORDER BY cnt DESC) AS rank
  FROM counts
)
SELECT
  rank AS "Rank",
  cnt AS "Total Detections",
  cnt AS "Size",
  common_name AS "Name"
FROM ranked;

panels.title: Species Rank-vs-Count Bubble Chart

panels.description: Heatmap of total call volume for each hour of the day (0–23), highlighting peak times of detections, lighter means more detections in that hour

targets.rawSql:
SELECT
  extract(hour from time) AS detection_hour,
  COUNT(*) AS detections
FROM sensor_data
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(time)
  AND common_name IN ($specie)
  AND common_name NOT IN (${exclude:sqlstring})
  AND confidence >= $confidence
GROUP BY detection_hour
ORDER BY detection_hour;

panels.title: Hourly Activity Pattern Detection

panels.description: Bar chart showing how often model outputs low vs high confidence scores across all species in the current time window

targets.rawSql:
SELECT
  ((width_bucket(confidence, 0, 1, 20) - 1)::float / 20) AS bucket_start,
  count(*) AS cnt
FROM sensor_data
WHERE $__timeFilter(time)
  AND common_name IN ($specie)
  AND common_name NOT IN (${exclude:sqlstring})
  AND confidence >= $confidence
GROUP BY bucket_start
ORDER BY bucket_start;

panels.title: Confidence Score Distribution

panels.description: Displays per-day confidence distributions (min, Q1, median, Q3, max) for all species, good for spotting days when the model’s certainty was unusually tight or widely scattered

targets.rawSql:
WITH stats AS (
  SELECT
    $__timeGroup(time, '1d')                   AS bucket_time,          -- daily buckets
    min(confidence)                             AS low,                 -- whisker bottom
    percentile_cont(0.25) WITHIN GROUP (ORDER BY confidence) AS open,   -- Q1
    percentile_cont(0.50) WITHIN GROUP (ORDER BY confidence) AS median, -- median
    percentile_cont(0.75) WITHIN GROUP (ORDER BY confidence) AS close,  -- Q3
    max(confidence)                             AS high,                -- whisker top
    count(*)                                    AS volume               -- count of points
  FROM sensor_data
  WHERE $__timeFilter(time)
  GROUP BY 1
)
SELECT
  bucket_time   AS "time", 
  open, 
  high, 
  low, 
  close, 
  median, 
  volume
FROM stats
ORDER BY bucket_time;

panels.title: Daily Confidence Ranges (Box & Whisker)

panels.description: Each dot is one detection plotted by timestamp (x-axis) vs. confidence (y-axis), colour-coded by species. This allows to see both the spread of low vs high confidence calls and any temporal patterns per specie

targets.rawSql:
SELECT
  time AS time,
  confidence AS " ",
  common_name AS species
FROM sensor_data
WHERE $__timeFilter(time)
  AND common_name IN ($specie)
  AND common_name NOT IN(${exclude:sqlstring})
  AND confidence >= $confidence 
ORDER BY time ASC

panels.title: Detection Confidence Scatter (by Species)

panels.description: Plots the mean confidence per hour (0–1) as a time series. Helps track drift in overall model certainty throughout the day and time

targets.rawSql:
SELECT
  time_bucket('1 hour', time)    AS "time",
  round(avg(confidence)::numeric, 3) AS "Mean confidence"
FROM sensor_data
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(time)
  AND common_name IN ($specie)
  AND common_name NOT IN (${exclude:sqlstring})
GROUP BY 1
ORDER BY 1;

panels.title: Hourly Mean Confidence

targets.rawSql:
SELECT
  time,
  start_seconds,
  end_seconds,
  scientific_name,
  common_name,
  confidence,
  sensor_id
FROM sensor_data
WHERE $__timeFilter(time)
  AND common_name IN ($specie)
  AND common_name NOT IN(${exclude:sqlstring})
  AND confidence >= $confidence

panels.description: Bar chart showing each species's change in weekly detection counts between the two most recent one-week periods in the selected time window. Upward-facing bars indicate increases, downward-facing bars indicate decreases

targets.rawSql:
WITH wk AS (
  SELECT
    common_name,
    time_bucket('1 week', time) AS wk,
    count(*) AS cnt
  FROM sensor_data
  WHERE $__timeFilter(time)
    AND common_name IN ($specie)
    AND common_name NOT IN (${exclude:sqlstring})
    AND confidence >= $confidence
  GROUP BY 1,2
),
sorted_weeks AS (
  SELECT DISTINCT wk
  FROM wk
  ORDER BY wk DESC
  LIMIT 2
),
current AS (
  SELECT common_name, cnt
  FROM wk
  WHERE wk = (SELECT MIN(wk) FROM sorted_weeks)
),
previous AS (
  SELECT common_name, cnt AS prev_cnt
  FROM wk
  WHERE wk = (SELECT MAX(wk) FROM sorted_weeks)
)
SELECT
  c.common_name   AS metric,
  c.cnt - coalesce(p.prev_cnt,0) AS delta
FROM current c
LEFT JOIN previous p USING (common_name)
ORDER BY delta DESC;

panels.title: Week-over-Week Species Growth (Δ in Detections)

panels.description: Dual‐line chart comparing daily detection total counts this year versus the same dates last year, helps revealing spot seasonal shifts or unexpected anomalies in annual patterns

targets.rawSql:
WITH current_period AS (
  SELECT
    date_trunc('day', time) AS day,
    count(*) AS cnt
  FROM sensor_data
  WHERE
    time BETWEEN $__timeFrom()::timestamp
    AND $__timeTo()::timestamp
    AND common_name IN ($specie)
    AND common_name NOT IN (${exclude:sqlstring})
    AND confidence >= $confidence
  GROUP BY 1
),
last_year_period AS (
  SELECT
    -- shift last year date forward by 1 year so they line up with this year axis
    date_trunc('day', time + INTERVAL '1 year') AS day,
    count(*) AS cnt
  FROM sensor_data
  WHERE
    time BETWEEN $__timeFrom()::timestamp - INTERVAL '1 year'
    AND $__timeTo()::timestamp - INTERVAL '1 year'
    AND common_name IN ($specie)
    AND common_name NOT IN (${exclude:sqlstring})
    AND confidence >= $confidence
  GROUP BY 1
)
SELECT
  day AS "time",
  cnt AS "Count",
  'This Year' AS series
FROM current_period
UNION ALL
SELECT
  day AS "time",
  cnt AS "Count",
  'Last Year' AS series
FROM last_year_period
ORDER BY time, series;

panels.title: Year‐over‐Year Daily Counts

targets.rawSql:
SELECT
  date_trunc('day', time)                        AS "time",
  count(*)                                        AS "Total detections",
  count(DISTINCT scientific_name)                  AS "Species count"
FROM sensor_data
WHERE $__timeFilter(time)
GROUP BY 1
ORDER BY 1;

SELECT
  common_name,
  COUNT(*) AS total_by_species
FROM sensor_data
WHERE $__timeFilter(time)
  AND common_name IN ($specie)
  AND common_name NOT IN (${exclude:sqlstring})
  AND confidence >= $confidence 
GROUP BY common_name
ORDER BY total_by_species DESC;

SELECT
  $__timeGroupAlias(time, '1h'),     
  common_name,
  COUNT(*) 
FROM sensor_data
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(time)               -- respects your dashboard time picker
  AND common_name IN ($specie)      -- template var for included species
  AND common_name NOT IN (${exclude:sqlstring})  -- template var for excluded species
  AND confidence >= $confidence     -- template var for minimum confidence
GROUP BY 1, common_name             -- group by your time bucket + species
ORDER BY 1                          -- sort by time asc

panels.title: Question it answers: how do detection counts rise and fall over time

targets.rawSql:
SELECT
  $__timeGroupAlias(time, '1d'),     
  common_name,
  COUNT(*)
FROM sensor_data
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(time)               -- respects your dashboard time picker
  AND common_name IN ($specie)      -- template var for included species
  AND common_name NOT IN (${exclude:sqlstring})  -- template var for excluded species
  AND confidence >= $confidence     -- template var for minimum confidence
GROUP BY 1, common_name             -- group by your time bucket + species
ORDER BY 1                          -- sort by time asc

panels.title: Question it answers: Of a day's total detections, which species contributed how much

targets.rawSql:
WITH stats AS (
  SELECT
    $__timeGroup(time, '1d')                   AS bucket_time,          -- daily buckets
    min(confidence)                             AS low,                 -- whisker bottom
    percentile_cont(0.25) WITHIN GROUP (ORDER BY confidence) AS open,   -- Q1
    percentile_cont(0.50) WITHIN GROUP (ORDER BY confidence) AS median, -- median
    percentile_cont(0.75) WITHIN GROUP (ORDER BY confidence) AS close,  -- Q3
    max(confidence)                             AS high,                -- whisker top
    count(*)                                    AS volume               -- count of points
  FROM sensor_data
  WHERE $__timeFilter(time)
  GROUP BY 1
)
SELECT
  bucket_time   AS "time", 
  open, 
  high, 
  low, 
  close, 
  median, 
  volume
FROM stats
ORDER BY bucket_time;

SELECT
  date_trunc('day', time)     AS date,
  common_name                 AS species,
  COUNT(*)                    AS cnt
FROM sensor_data
WHERE $__timeFilter(time)
  AND confidence >= $confidence
  AND common_name IN ($specie)
GROUP BY 1,2
ORDER BY 1,2;

SELECT
  time AS "time",
  confidence AS "c",
  scientific_name
FROM sensor_data
WHERE $__timeFilter(time)
  AND common_name IN ($specie)
  AND common_name NOT IN(${exclude:sqlstring})
  AND confidence >= $confidence 
ORDER BY time ASC

SELECT
  extract(hour from time) AS detection_hour,
  COUNT(*) AS " "
FROM sensor_data
WHERE $__timeFilter(time)
  AND common_name IN ($specie)
  AND common_name NOT IN(${exclude:sqlstring})
  AND confidence >= $confidence 
GROUP BY detection_hour
ORDER BY detection_hour;

SELECT
  time,
  start_seconds,
  end_seconds,
  scientific_name,
  common_name,
  confidence,
  sensor_id
FROM sensor_data
WHERE $__timeFilter(time)
  AND common_name IN ($specie)
  AND common_name NOT IN(${exclude:sqlstring})
  AND confidence >= $confidence

SELECT 
  count(*) AS total_detections
FROM sensor_data
WHERE $__timeFilter(time)
  AND common_name IN ($specie)
  AND common_name NOT IN(${exclude:sqlstring})
  AND confidence >= $confidence

SELECT
  count(DISTINCT common_name) AS unique_species
FROM sensor_data
WHERE $__timeFilter(time)
  AND common_name IN ($specie)
  AND common_name NOT IN(${exclude:sqlstring})
  AND confidence >= $confidence

SELECT 
  avg(confidence) AS avg_confidence
FROM sensor_data
WHERE $__timeFilter(time)
  AND common_name IN ($specie)
  AND common_name NOT IN(${exclude:sqlstring})
  AND confidence >= $confidence

SELECT
  AVG(end_seconds - start_seconds) AS avg_audio_length_seconds
FROM sensor_data
WHERE $__timeFilter(time)
  AND common_name IN ($specie)

SELECT
  count(*) * 3600.0
    / extract(
        epoch
        FROM $__timeTo()::timestamp
          - $__timeFrom()::timestamp
      )
  AS avg_per_hour
FROM sensor_data
WHERE $__timeFilter(time);

SELECT
  extract(
    epoch
    FROM $__timeTo()::timestamp
      - $__timeFrom()::timestamp
  ) 
  / 3600.0
  AS window_hours;

SELECT
  date_trunc('day', time)                        AS "time",
  count(*)                                        AS total_obs,
  count(DISTINCT scientific_name)                  AS species_count
FROM sensor_data
WHERE $__timeFilter(time)
GROUP BY 1
ORDER BY 1;

SELECT
  common_name,
  COUNT(*) AS total_by_species
FROM sensor_data
WHERE $__timeFilter(time)
  AND common_name IN ($specie)
  AND common_name NOT IN (${exclude:sqlstring})
  AND confidence >= $confidence 
GROUP BY common_name
ORDER BY total_by_species DESC;

SELECT
  time AS timestamp,
  confidence
FROM
  sensor_data
WHERE $__timeFilter(time)
ORDER BY
  timestamp ASC;

SELECT
  extract(hour from time) AS detection_hour,
  COUNT(*) AS " "
FROM sensor_data
WHERE $__timeFilter(time)
  AND common_name IN ($specie)
  AND common_name NOT IN(${exclude:sqlstring})
  AND confidence >= $confidence 
GROUP BY detection_hour
ORDER BY detection_hour;

SELECT
  date_trunc('h', time)     AS date,
  common_name                 AS species,
  COUNT(*)                    AS cnt
FROM sensor_data
WHERE $__timeFilter(time)
  AND confidence >= $confidence
  AND common_name IN ($specie)
GROUP BY 1,2
ORDER BY 1,2;

SELECT
  time,
  start_seconds,
  end_seconds,
  scientific_name,
  common_name,
  confidence,
  sensor_id
FROM sensor_data
WHERE $__timeFilter(time)
  AND common_name IN ($specie)
  AND common_name NOT IN(${exclude:sqlstring})
  AND confidence >= $confidence

SELECT
  time AS "time",
  confidence,
  scientific_name
FROM sensor_data
WHERE $__timeFilter(time)
  AND common_name IN ($specie)
  AND common_name NOT IN(${exclude:sqlstring})
  AND confidence >= $confidence 
ORDER BY time ASC

SELECT 
  count(*) AS total_detections
FROM sensor_data
WHERE $__timeFilter(time)

SELECT
  count(DISTINCT common_name) AS unique_species
FROM sensor_data
WHERE $__timeFilter(time)

SELECT
  AVG(end_seconds - start_seconds) AS avg_audio_length_seconds
FROM sensor_data
WHERE $__timeFilter("time");

SELECT 
  avg(confidence) AS avg_confidence
FROM sensor_data
WHERE $__timeFilter(time)

SELECT
  extract(hour from time) AS detection_hour,
  COUNT(*) AS detections
FROM sensor_data
WHERE $__timeFilter(time)
GROUP BY detection_hour
ORDER BY detection_hour;

SELECT 
  time_bucket('1 day', time) as day,
  count(*) as total_detections
FROM sensor_data 
WHERE $__timeFilter(time)
GROUP BY day
ORDER BY day

SELECT
  time AS "Detection Time",
  -- scientific_name AS "Sci Name",
  common_name AS "Common Name",
  confidence AS "Confidence"
FROM sensor_data
WHERE $__timeFilter(time)
ORDER BY time DESC
LIMIT 10;

SELECT
  common_name,
  COUNT(*) AS total_by_species
FROM sensor_data
WHERE $__timeFilter(sensor_data.time)
GROUP BY common_name
ORDER BY total_by_species DESC;

SELECT 
  time_bucket('1 day', sensor_data.time) AS "time",
  common_name AS species, 
  AVG(confidence) AS avg
FROM sensor_data
WHERE $__timeFilter(sensor_data.time)
GROUP BY 1, species
ORDER BY 1 ASC, species ASC

SELECT
  time,
  start_seconds,
  end_seconds,
  scientific_name,
  common_name,
  confidence,
  sensor_id
FROM sensor_data
WHERE $__timeFilter(time)

SELECT
  common_name,
  COUNT(*) AS total_by_species
FROM sensor_data
WHERE $__timeFilter(time)
  AND common_name IN ($specie)
  AND common_name NOT IN (${exclude:sqlstring})
  AND confidence >= $confidence 
GROUP BY common_name
ORDER BY total_by_species DESC;

panels.description: Rank species by total count in a compact bar chart.

targets.rawSql:
SELECT
  common_name AS "metric",
  count(*) AS "value"
FROM sensor_data
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(time)
  AND common_name IN ($specie)
  AND common_name NOT IN (${exclude:sqlstring})
  AND confidence >= $confidence
GROUP BY common_name
ORDER BY value DESC;

panels.title: Species Distribution (Horizontal Bar)

targets.rawSql:
SELECT
  common_name,
  COUNT(*) AS total_by_species
FROM sensor_data
WHERE $__timeFilter(time)
  AND common_name IN ($specie)
  AND common_name NOT IN (${exclude:sqlstring})
  AND confidence >= $confidence 
GROUP BY common_name
ORDER BY total_by_species DESC;

panels.description: Heatmap of total call volume for each hour of the day (0–23), highlighting peak times of detections, lighter means more detections in that hour

targets.rawSql:
SELECT
  extract(hour FROM time) AS "hour",
  common_name AS "metric",
  count(*) AS "value"
FROM sensor_data
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(time)
  AND common_name IN ($specie)
  AND common_name NOT IN (${exclude:sqlstring})
  AND confidence >= $confidence
GROUP BY 1,2
ORDER BY 1,2;

panels.title: Hourly Activity Heatmap

targets.rawSql:
SELECT
  time AS "Detection Time",
  scientific_name AS "Sci Name",
  common_name AS "Common Name",
  confidence AS "Confidence"
FROM sensor_data
WHERE $__timeFilter(time)
  AND common_name IN ($specie)
  AND common_name NOT IN(${exclude:sqlstring})
  AND confidence >= $confidence 
ORDER BY time DESC
LIMIT 10;

WITH stats AS (
  SELECT
    $__timeGroup(time,'1d')   AS bucket_time,
    min(confidence)            AS low,
    percentile_cont(0.25)
      WITHIN GROUP (ORDER BY confidence) AS open,
    percentile_cont(0.75)
      WITHIN GROUP (ORDER BY confidence) AS close,
    max(confidence)            AS high,
    count(*)                   AS volume
  FROM sensor_data
  WHERE $__timeFilter(time)
  GROUP BY 1
)
SELECT
  bucket_time AS "time",
  open, high, low, close, volume
FROM stats
ORDER BY bucket_time;

SELECT
  date_trunc('day', time)     AS date,
  common_name                 AS species,
  COUNT(*)                    AS cnt
FROM sensor_data
WHERE $__timeFilter(time)
  AND confidence >= $confidence
  AND common_name IN ($specie)
GROUP BY 1,2
ORDER BY 1,2;

SELECT
  date_trunc('day', time)     AS date,
  common_name                 AS species,
  COUNT(*)                    AS cnt
FROM sensor_data
WHERE $__timeFilter(time)
  AND confidence >= $confidence
  AND common_name IN ($specie)
GROUP BY 1,2
ORDER BY 1,2;

SELECT
  time AS "time",
  confidence,
  scientific_name
FROM sensor_data
WHERE $__timeFilter(time)
ORDER BY time ASC

SELECT
  time_bucket('1h', time) AS bucket,
  percentile_cont(0.25) WITHIN GROUP (ORDER BY confidence) AS q1,
  percentile_cont(0.50) WITHIN GROUP (ORDER BY confidence) AS median,
  percentile_cont(0.75) WITHIN GROUP (ORDER BY confidence) AS q3
FROM sensor_data
WHERE $__timeFilter(time)
GROUP BY bucket
ORDER BY bucket;

panels.description: Dual axes to compare volume vs diversity. Bar = total number of detections per day. Line = count of unique species detected each day

targets.rawSql:
SELECT
  date_trunc('day', time)                        AS "time",
  count(*)                                        AS "Total detections",
  count(DISTINCT scientific_name)                  AS "Species count"
FROM sensor_data
WHERE $__timeFilter(time)
GROUP BY 1
ORDER BY 1;

panels.title: Daily Volume  and Species Count
